short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Planner data in JSON format to use in business analytics softwares like Power BI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1 - Login to Microsoft Planner (https://tasks.office.com/)
2 - Click extension icon and Options
3 - Choose the Microsoft Teams group assigned to your projects
4 - Download JSON file!

This extension enable the download of Microsoft Planner data to use in business analytics softwares like Microsoft Power BI.

With it you can power up your Microsoft Planner by allowing Portfolio Management of your organization projects.

The generated JSON contains data about:

- Plans
- Buckets
- Tasks
- Users / Members
- Assignments (Tasks x Users/Members)
